sentences.en: That allegation is a flat-out lie.
sentences.cn: 那一个指控是彻底的谎言。

sentences.en: He has hired a lawyer to defend him against the allegation.
sentences.cn: 他已聘请一位律师为他所受的指控辩护。

sentences.en: The inspectors found no evidence which supported any allegation of suppression of official documents.
sentences.cn: 这些检察官们找不到证据证明对封锁官方文件的任何指控。
